meta.name: Todo App
meta.description: A todo app with CRUD operations, calendar integration, prioritization, task completion notifications, and dependency management.

features.name: CRUD Operations
features.description: Create, Read, Update, and Delete tasks
userStories: As a user, I want to create new tasks
As a user, I want to read existing tasks

features.name: Calendar Integration
features.description: Integrate calendar events with task scheduling
userStories: As a user, I want to schedule tasks on my calendar
As a user, I want to receive reminders for upcoming tasks

features.name: Prioritization
features.description: Enable users to set priorities for their tasks
userStories: As a user, I want to set priorities for my tasks
As a user, I want to view prioritized tasks

features.name: Task Completion Notifications
features.description: Send notifications to users when tasks are completed
userStories: As a user, I want to receive notifications when tasks are completed
As a user, I want to view task completion history

features.name: Dependency Management
features.description: Enable users to set dependencies between tasks
userStories: As a user, I want to set dependencies between tasks
As a user, I want to view dependency relationships

databaseSchema.name: tasks
databaseSchema.description: Task schema with attributes (title, description, priority, due date, completion status)

databaseSchema.name: calendarEvents
databaseSchema.description: Calendar event schema with attributes (title, start date, end date)

coreComponents.name: TaskList
coreComponents.description: Display list of tasks with CRUD operations

coreComponents.name: TaskDetail
coreComponents.description: Display details for a single task with CRUD operations

coreComponents.name: CalendarView
coreComponents.description: Display calendar view with scheduled tasks and reminders
